hero.title:
Angelina AI: The WhatsApp AI agent that
automates your
hero.subtitle: Revolutionize your restaurant management. Automate your orders, manage your inventory, handle complaints and coordinate deliveries with our intelligent AI agent specialized for restaurants

features.title: Powerful Features for
features.subtitle: Everything you need to streamline your restaurant operations and provide exceptional customer service through WhatsApp.
features.comingSoon: And many more features coming soon...

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your restaurant

orders.question: How does the agent handle orders?
orders.answer: Angelina AI presents your menu, takes orders via numbers, automatically checks stock and sends digital invoices.

stocks.question: How does inventory management work?
stocks.answer: The agent checks your stock in real-time via Excel or API, suggests alternatives when out of stock and automatically updates after each order.

complaints.question: What happens with customer complaints?
complaints.answer: The agent analyzes problems, proposes automatic solutions (refund, discount) and escalates to manager for complex cases.

marketplace.question: What is Marketplace Mode?
marketplace.answer: Marketplace mode allows the main Angelina AI assistant to manage all restaurant agents to help customers view, discuss and order from any restaurant.

amadou.name: Amadou Fall
amadou.content: Angelina AI revolutionized our customer service. Orders are taken automatically, no more lost customers! Our sales increased by 45%.

fatou.name: Fatou Diallo
fatou.content: Inventory management is now automatic. The agent suggests alternatives when a dish is no longer available. Our customers love it!

jean.name: Jean-Baptiste Koffi
jean.content: Complaints are handled instantly. The agent proposes solutions and only bothers us for really important cases. Perfect!

marie.name: Marie Agbessi
marie.content: Angelina AI coordinates our deliveries according to urgency and location. No more delays, no more unhappy customers!

kossi.name: Kossi Togbe
kossi.content: The agent informs us in real-time about available stock and allows quick addition of new products. Huge time saver!

grace.name: Grace Lawson
grace.content: Our customers receive notifications at every step: preparation, kitchen exit, delivery. The customer experience is exceptional!

configure.title: Configure Angelina AI
configure.description: Restaurant configures Angelina AI by providing restaurant details: menu, hours, location, and preferences in just a few minutes

generate.title: Agent generated with link & QR code
generate.description: Your personalized AI agent is automatically generated and you receive a unique link and QR code to share with your customers

deploy.title: Use in restaurant & share with clients
deploy.description: Deploy the agent in your restaurant and share the link/QR code with your clients to start receiving orders immediately

marketplace.title: Join the Marketplace Mode
marketplace.description: Your Angelina AI agent is added to the agents network where the main Angelina AI assistant manages all restaurant agents to help end users view, discuss, and order from any restaurant

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready!
enterprise.subtitle: Security and compliance for your business

privacy.title: Guaranteed Privacy
privacy.description: Your data is protected and encrypted

compliance.title: Global Compliance
compliance.description: Respect for GDPR and international regulations
